languages.text: "Не терпится?" {n}— хмыкает Капеллан.{/n} "Дождитесь конца похорон. Денз отправится в огонь, после будет оглашена последняя воля, и вы официально вступите в наследство".

"You just can't wait, can you?" {n}Chaplain scoffs.{/n} "After the funeral. Denz will be delivered into the flames, then we will announce his last will and testament, and you will officially come into your inheritance."
languages.original_text: "Не терпится?" {n}— хмыкает Капеллан.{/n} "Дождитесь конца похорон. Денз отправится в огонь, после будет оглашена последняя воля, и вы официально вступите в наследство".

traits.locale_text: "You just can't wait, can you?" {n}Chaplain scoffs.{/n} "After the funeral. Denz will be delivered into the flames, then we will announce his last will and testament, and you will officially come into the inheritance."

"You just can't wait, can you?" {n}Chaplain scoffs.{/n} "After the funeral. Denz will be delivered into the flames, then we will announce his last will and testament, and you will officially come into the inheritance."

"You just can't wait, can you?" {n}Chaplain scoffs.{/n} "After the funeral. Denz will be delivered into the flames, then we will announce his last will and testament, and you will officially come into your inheritance."

"You just can't wait, can you?" {n}Chaplain scoffs.{/n} "After the funeral. Denz will be delivered into the flames, then we will announce his last will and testament, and you will officially come into your inheritance."

"You just can't wait, can you?" {n}Chaplain scoffs.{/n} "After the funeral. Denz will be delivered into the flames, then we will announce his last will and testament, and you will officially come into your inheritance."

languages.text: “你已经等不及了，是吗？”{n}牧师冷哼了一声。{/n}“等葬礼结束之后，丹兹会被送进火堆里。之后，我们会宣布他最后的遗嘱，而你将正式得到遗产的继承权。”
languages.original_text: "You just can't wait, can you?" {n}Chaplain scoffs.{/n} "After the funeral. Denz will be delivered into the flames, then we will announce his last will and testament, and you will officially come into your inheritance."

traits.locale_text: “你已经等不及了，是吗？”{n}牧师冷哼了一声。{/n}“等葬礼结束之后，丹兹会被送进火堆里。之后，我们会宣布他最后的遗嘱，而你将正式得到遗产的继承权。”

languages.text: «No tiene ni un atisbo de paciencia, ¿no?». {n}Capellán pregunta con sorna.{/n} «Después del funeral. Denz se entregará a las llamas, anunciaremos su testamento y obtendrá oficialmente su herencia».
languages.original_text: "You just can't wait, can you?" {n}Chaplain scoffs.{/n} "After the funeral. Denz will be delivered into the flames, then we will announce his last will and testament, and you will officially come into your inheritance."

traits.locale_text: «No tiene ni un atisbo de paciencia, ¿no?». {n}Capellán pregunta con sorna.{/n} «Después del funeral. Denz se entregará a las llamas, anunciaremos su testamento y obtendrá oficialmente su herencia».

languages.text: 「よほど待ちきれないようですね」{n}教戒官は嘲笑した。{/n}「葬式の後です。デンツは火葬され、その後に彼の遺言を発表し、あなたが正式に遺産を相続することになります」
languages.original_text: "You just can't wait, can you?" {n}Chaplain scoffs.{/n} "After the funeral. Denz will be delivered into the flames, then we will announce his last will and testament, and you will officially come into your inheritance."

traits.locale_text: 「よほど待ちきれないようですね」{n}教戒官は嘲笑した。{/n}「葬式の後です。デンツは火葬され、その後に彼の遺言を発表し、あなたが正式に遺産を相続することになります」

languages.text: "Ihr könnt es gar nicht erwarten, was?", {n}spöttelt Ordenspriester.{/n} "Nach der Bestattung. Denz wird den Flammen übergeben, dann verkünden wir seinen letzten Willen, und Ihr erhaltet offiziell Euer Erbe."
languages.original_text: "You just can't wait, can you?" {n}Chaplain scoffs.{/n} "After the funeral. Denz will be delivered into the flames, then we will announce his last will and testament, and you will officially come into your inheritance."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt es gar nicht erwarten, was?", {n}spöttelt Ordenspriester.{/n} "Nach der Bestattung. Denz wird den Flammen übergeben, dann verkünden wir seinen letzten Willen, und Ihr erhaltet offiziell Euer Erbe."

languages.text: {n}Chapelain pousse un grognement.{/n} « Vous avez hâte de mettre la main dessus, hein ? Après les funérailles. Une fois que Denz aura été livré aux flammes, nous ferons la lecture de ses dernières volontés et de son testament, et l'héritage sera officiellement vôtre. »
languages.original_text: "You just can't wait, can you?" {n}Chaplain scoffs.{/n} "After the funeral. Denz will be delivered into the flames, then we will announce his last will and testament, and you will officially come into your inheritance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain pousse un grognement.{/n} « Vous avez hâte de mettre la main dessus, hein ? Après les funérailles. Une fois que Denz aura été livré aux flammes, nous ferons la lecture de ses dernières volontés et de son testament, et l'héritage sera officiellement vôtre. »

languages.text: "Sabır denen şeyden bihaber misiniz?" {n}Papaz dudak büküyor.{/n} "Cenazeden sonra. Denz'i ateşlere uğurlayacağız, sonra da son arzusuyla vasiyetnamesini okuyacağız. Ardından resmî olarak mirasa konacaksınız."
languages.original_text: "You just can't wait, can you?" {n}Chaplain scoffs.{/n} "After the funeral. Denz will be delivered into the flames, then we will announce his last will and testament, and you will officially come into your inheritance."

traits.locale_text: "Sabır denen şeyden bihaber misiniz?" {n}Papaz dudak büküyor.{/n} "Cenazeden sonra. Denz'i ateşlere uğurlayacağız ve sonra son arzusuyla vasiyetnamesini okuyacağız. Ardından resmî olarak mirasa konacaksınız."
